ABOUT ME

I am Valeriy Kovalenko. Html Coder.

In my experience, there are only personal projects, a couple of them are on the git hub. I always strive to learn from a practical example, working with real problems, so I always tried to learn something by applying it in practice.

HTML5, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, OOP, Sass, Gulp, Flexbox, Responsive, fluid and cross-browser layout.

The ability to self-organize at the right time, regardless of the situation, to complete everything on time and do it as best as possible.

I would like to become a member of a friendly team that will always help in a difficult situation and will work like a really team, supporting each other and participating in the project together.
